creator: Astrum Computing
descriptionHtml:
The only mobile card wallet you’ll ever need!

Easily store, organize and use your gift cards, loyalty cards, rewards cards and membership cards with your phone. Declutter your wallet with Card Smash!

Backup & Store Your Cards
Don’t you hate it when you lose your card? With Card Smash, you can backup and store your card information on your mobile phone so, even if you lose you plastic, you’ll still be able to enjoy the benefits of your card.

No More Cluttered Wallets
If, like many of us, you have space for 10 cards yet cram 20 in your wallet, Card Smash is for you. Ditch the plastic cards and access all your gift, loyalty, rewards and membership cards on your phone. Card Smash has so many features to help organise and manage your cards, you’ll wonder why you ever used your wallet!

Card Smash – Features
● Securely backup your cards on Microsoft secure servers
● Secure encryption keeps your details safe
● Access your gift, loyalty, membership and rewards cards from your phone, even if you lose the plastic cards or forget your wallet!
● Cards are backed up. If you lose your phone, your stored cards can be restored via your online account
● Share your cards wirelessly with users on other Android or iOS devices.
● No need to share one card; family members can have access to the same cards at the same time
● Search, manage & organize your stored cards
● Create barcodes and choose barcode types for any existing card, even ones with no barcode!
● Seamlessly switch between loyalty, gift, membership and rewards cards for the same merchant
● No internet connection? No problem! Card Smash has 100% offline functionality
● Mark a card as complete so you can discard it
● Sync cards across mobile devices
● Available on Android and iOS
● Uses ZXing Mobile barcode scanner

★ Ditch the plastic and manage your cards the smart way. Download Card Smash for FREE today! ★

title: Card Smash: Virtual Card Wallet & Organizer

creator: Astrum Computing
descriptionHtml:
The only mobile card wallet you’ll ever need!

Securely store, organize and use your gift cards, loyalty cards, rewards cards and membership cards with your phone. Declutter your wallet with Card Smash!

Add Any Card
You can securely store any card on Card Smash. Including insurance and library cards. In addition, you can take a picture of your card. If the doctor's office needs to see a copy of your insurance card. It is available.

Track Card Balance
Easily track and update your card balance as you use your card.

Change Default Card Logo
You can change the default logo for any card. The new logo will automatically display on your card and Apple Wallet.

Backup & Store Your Cards
Don’t you hate it when you lose your card? With Card Smash, you can backup your card online and store your card information on your mobile phone, so even if you lose your plastic, you’ll still be able to enjoy the benefits of your card.

No More Cluttered Wallets
If, like many of us, you have space for 10 cards yet cram 20 in your wallet, Card Smash is for you. Ditch the plastic cards and access all your gift, loyalty, rewards and membership cards on your phone. Card Smash has so many features to help organize and manage your cards, you’ll wonder why you ever used your wallet!

Card Smash – Features
● Add any card
● Add card pictures and change the default logo
● Add your card to Apple Wallet
● Securely backup your cards online
● Track your card balance
● Secure encryption keeps your details safe
● Access your gift, loyalty, membership and rewards cards from your phone, even if you lose the plastic cards or forget your wallet!
● Cards are backed up. If you lose your phone, your stored cards can be restored via your online account
● Share your cards wirelessly with users on other Android or iOS devices.
● No need to share one card; family members can have access to the same cards at the same time
● Search, manage & organize your stored cards
● Create barcodes and choose barcode types for any existing card, even ones with no barcode!
● Seamlessly switch between loyalty, gift, membership and rewards cards for the same merchant
● No internet connection? No problem! Card Smash has 100% offline functionality
● Mark a card as complete so you can discard it
● Sync cards across mobile devices
● Available on Android and iOS


★ Ditch the plastic and manage your cards the smart way. Download Card Smash for FREE today! ★
